statements: SELECT * FROM OrderBook
SELECT Symbol, Price FROM OrderBook WHERE Quantity > 100
SELECT OrderID, Symbol, Price, Quantity FROM OrderBook ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT MAX(Price) AS HighestPrice FROM OrderBook
SELECT Symbol, AVG(Price) AS AveragePrice FROM OrderBook GROUP BY Symbol
SELECT * FROM OrderBook WHERE Symbol='AAPL' ORDER BY Price DESC, Timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT Symbol, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM OrderBook GROUP BY Symbol HAVING TotalQuantity > 1000
SELECT Symbol, AVG(Price) AS AveragePrice FROM OrderBook GROUP BY Symbol
SELECT * FROM OrderBook WHERE Price > 100 AND Quantity < 50 ORDER BY Price ASC, Timestamp DESC
SELECT Symbol, MAX(Timestamp) AS LatestTimestamp FROM OrderBook GROUP BY Symbol ORDER BY LatestTimestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM OrderBook ORDER BY order_price DESC, order_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_price FROM OrderBook WHERE participant_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM MarketDepth WHERE instrument_id = 2001 AND bid_price > 100 ORDER BY bid_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity FROM OrderBook WHERE order_type = 'BUY' AND order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_price, order_quantity FROM OrderBook WHERE order_quantity < 50 AND order_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY order_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM OrderBook WHERE order_type='BUY' ORDER BY order_price DESC, order_quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, participant_id, order_type, order_price FROM OrderBook WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketDepth WHERE bid_price > ask_price ORDER BY bid_price DESC, ask_price ASC;
SELECT SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM OrderBook WHERE participant_id=5;
SELECT MAX(bid_price) AS max_bid_price, MIN(ask_price) AS min_ask_price FROM MarketDepth;
SELECT * FROM order_books;
SELECT symbol, price FROM order_books WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT symbol, price FROM order_books ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM order_books WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, trade_price, timestamp FROM trade_history ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM order_books WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price, quantity FROM order_books ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_quantity ASC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM order_books GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, trade_price, timestamp FROM trade_history WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_book LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_price FROM order_book WHERE participant_id = 123;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM participant ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT order_type, order_price FROM order_book WHERE order_price > 100 ORDER BY order_price ASC;
SELECT trade_id, buy_order_id, sell_order_id, trade_price, trade_timestamp FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_book WHERE order_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY order_price DESC, order_quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_price, order_quantity FROM order_book WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_quantity DESC;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM participant WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_depth WHERE total_orders > 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC, total_quantity DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_price >= 50.00 ORDER BY trade_price ASC, trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_participants;
SELECT participant_name, total_orders FROM market_participants WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_price FROM orders ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT trade_type, trade_price, trade_quantity FROM market_data WHERE data_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM order_book JOIN market_data ON order_book.data_id = market_data.data_id;
SELECT * FROM market_participants;
SELECT participant_name, total_orders FROM market_participants ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT order_type, order_price FROM orders WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_timestamp, trade_type, trade_price FROM market_data WHERE trade_quantity >= 50 ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC;
SELECT participant_name, total_orders FROM market_participants WHERE total_orders < 5 OR total_orders = 10 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
